home.about-us-text: We are a group of engineering students from the University of Minho based in the city of Guimarães (Azurém Campus) with a pation for motorsport. As the latest addition to the Formula Student scene in Portugal, we aim to deliver a project with a solid foundation and, in the short term, become a reference in the north of the country.
home.why-fs-text: Formula Student gives us students the chance to get a taste of the world of engineering. Building our car requires us to apply all the knowledge we have about our areas of expertise and work with parteners that besides supporting our project, can help us improve our methods. This project also aims to develop soft skills like menagement, communication and team work, all crucial in a top tier engineer.
home.competition-text: Formula Student is divided in 3 classes. Class 2 requires the presentation of a project and a prototype. Class 1 will require a dynamic presentation of a car equiped with an internal combustion engine. Class 1A challenges teams to build a car moved by an alternative source of energy.
home.planet-text: We are commited to a greener future. That's why we chose to equip our car with an electric power unit. The team will also support a circular economy, promoting the reuse of electrical components from portuguese industries in order to reduce e-waste. At least 25% of electronic 'trash' that reaches recycling centers, still is higly reusable. This materials are fundamental to reduce our carbon footprint.
home.roadmap1:
february '23

Present a prototype of an
electric car to compete in
class 2.
home.roadmap2:
march '23

Have established
partenerships with
companies.
home.roadmap3:
april '23

Gather suplies to
assemble the car.

mnt.title: Sector's role
mnt.text: The management sector handles the business side of the team. It is its responsibility to gather funds for the project via partnerships and also for its marketing. Management also has to fulfil the needs of the other departments. This includes ordering parts and tools or provide trainning sessions.
mnt.head: Sector Head

pwrt.title: Sector's role
pwrt.text: The powertrain secton is responsible for the development of the power unit. It's the sector's duty to deliver a reliable and powerful electric motor. Efficiency is also key in this sector. The power unit needs to be tuned in such a way that it is always consuming the right amount of energy.
pwrt.head: Sector Head

esw.title: Sector's role
esw.text: As the name suggests, the electronics & software sector handles all the electronic components and software that keep the car safe and running smooth. The sector makes sure all the major components of the car are properly programmed and communicating between each other.
esw.head: Sector Head

dvrt.title: Sector's role
dvrt.text: The drivetrain sector focus on delivering power from the engine to the wheels. It aims to achieve the most efficient power transfer in order to secure maximum acceleration and maintain speed for the full race distance.
dvrt.head: Sector Head

body.title: Sector's role
body.text: The body sector will take care of everything related to bodywork, aerodynamics, suspension and chassis. The sector's goals are to deliver a strong and light structure that is both able to handle the abuse on track and to keep the driver safe in case of impact, to produce aerodynamic compenents that keep the car stable at high speeds and to develop a suspension able to keep the wheels in contact with the track at all times.
body.head: Sector Head

invest.title: Work with us
invest.why-text: We are more than a group of students with a pation for motorsport. FSUM represents the first step in the formation of top engineers. Our members will enter the job market with experience and skills that will make them stand out. We want to offer students the chance of being part of a group that values everyone's work and pushes all members to show their full potencial. Investing in our project means investing in the next generation of engineers and making shure that they gather as much experience as possible so that some day in the future they make a difference and push technology foward.
invest.monetary-text: Motorsport isn't cheap at all. Expences start accumulating in the development of the car and can reach a great ammount when we start competing. Supporting financially our project helps us manage all the expences all reach our goals.
invest.materials-text: In order to build the car that we are designing, we'll need to gather various materials. Supplying materials to the team helps us take the car from the modeling software to the race track.
invest.knowledge-text: Even though we consider ourselves very skilled and talented, knowledge is never enough. We are always open to learn from actual profetionals from our areas of expertise.
invest.pack-partner-text: Partners will benefit from divulgation of their brands via social media campaigns and their logos will be present in our car.
invest.pack-partner-expetations: We expect our partners to also divulgate our brand and help us establish useful contacts.
invest.pack-bronze-text: Bronze sponsors will have a spot in our sponsor portfolio. They will have their logo present in the car in more visible parts of the bodywork and merchandising items. Lower tier benefits are also included.
invest.pack-bronze-expetations: Bronze sponsorship requires an investment between 1000€ and 2500€
invest.pack-silver-text: Silver sponsors will have VIP status in events organized by FSUM. Their logo will also be present on the car and merchandising, but will have more presence than bronze logos. This tier will receive a monthly report containing everything done by the team. Lower tier benefits are also included.
invest.pack-silver-expetations: Silver sponsorship requires an investment between 2500€ and 5000€
invest.pack-gold-text: Gold sponsors will have voting power in decision-making sessions. Their logo presence will be bigger compared to silver sponsors. The team will mention their company in press articles or scientific magazines. Lower tier benefits are also included.
invest.pack-gold-expetations: Gold sponsorship requires an investment between 5000€ and 10000€
